CadBerry/Events/BuildEvent.h¶

Imports¶

  • CadBerry pch file

  • CadBerry/Events/Event.h

PrebuildEvent class¶

Inherits from CDB::Event. This event is dispatched before CadBerry builds the project. This event is intended for saving any open files.

Categories¶

  • EventCategoryBuild

  • EventCategoryApplication

Event type¶

Prebuild

BuildStartEvent class¶

Inherits from CDB::Event. This event is dispatched right before CadBerry builds the project. This event is intended for any actions that need to be taken with up to date files before the build process.

Categories¶

  • EventCategoryBuild

  • EventCategoryApplication

Event type¶

BuildStart

PostbuildEvent¶

Inherits from CDB::Event. This event is dispatched after the build engine finishes building the project. This event is intended for clean-up operations

Categories¶

  • EventCategoryBuild

  • EventCategoryApplication

Event type¶

Postbuild

CadBerry
